column4: does anybody know why whwn i run a fullscreen application, x server restart and apppears login screen?
one application in particular, or any application that can be maximised?
graft: no particular application, every app which use fullscreen mode (such a game, a space explorer...)
any clues at the end of /var/log/xorg.log?
no, there's no any archive called xorg.con in this directory
line 808 looks like you might have found a bug to me
hahaha, the second bug I found, xdxd
and now what? report on launchpad or in x webpage?
dunno what ubuntu standard is, I only had ubuntu for 3 days (gentoo nut)
ok, but it's a bug or not?
its a bug, undefined symbol is an error in the source
as I said, I have no clue about ubuntu bug reporting, since its your bug, you need to do it
dont worry about it, worst that happens is they tell you its not a bug and close it
ok, only a thing, if a report this, should I copy entire log?
I dunno, there will be a help page associated with the bug report, see what it says
